entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this morning. A few showers beginning late this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 late this morning. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
